title: I'd say it's possible to play LoL with one hand now.
body: Someone should give it a try.

replies.body:
I do, I have 6 buttons on my mouse for all 6 abilities. 
Items are on my keyboard, but I could just not build actives
Tight. You should record it and put it up.
I don't think anyone would want to see that lol

I have a 12-key on my mouse in addition to a few other buttons/the mouse wheel.

I actually do play LoL with one hand for the most part. Occasionally I'll use my left hand if i'm trying to queue up actions extra fast.
Just play Vayne. All you really need to do is kite with right click 99% of the time.
I'm pretty sure someone played Riven with just mouse clicks only and also a controller. but you're titles' not wrong. It's just that it was already known and they facepalmed.
